root.name: The Sims 2: Kitchen and Bath Stuff
root.description: Features The Sims 2: Kitchen Bath Stuff adds a whole new variety of Kitchen and Bathroom furnishings for your Sims to use. There are several themed collections in the pack including a "Modern Kitchen", "Romantic Kitchen" and "European Bathroom". The pack comes with approximately 60 items including: dishwashers, refrigerators, toasters, showers, bathtubs, sinks, stoves, and decorative objects. The pack also includes several new clothing outfits for your Sims to enjoy including: bathrobes, casual wear, and more. The Sims 2 Kitchen Bath Stuff is the 6th Stuff Pack for The Sims 2.
